abstract: JPMorgan Chase raised concerns about Galleon Group‘s chief, Raj Rajaratnam, and his associates as far back as 2001, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase raised concerns about Galleon Group‘s chief, Raj Rajaratnam, and his associates as far back as 2001, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase  raised concerns about Galleon Group‘s chief, Raj Rajaratnam, and his associates as far back as 2001, The Financial Times reported, citing an internal company document seen by the newspaper.

headline.main: JPMorgan Said to Have Galleon Concerns in 2001
